rpg-system.dct:title: d20 System
rpg-system.scope: Originally intended for ongoing campaigns with a party of 3-6 players and one game master (the "Dungeon Master", or "DM"), d20 games have been adapted to solo play, one-shot tournament play, and other variations.
rpg-system.dct:description: A simulationist, dice-based system with a core mechanic based on rolling a 20-sided die, applying various situational modifiers, and comparing the result to a target value.
